messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] conference tape orders
messages.msgSnippet: I m pretty sure Kelly said about a month from the end of the conference. Sorry. Barb E Listen to your life. See it for the fathomless mystery that it is.  In
messages.messageBody:
I'm pretty sure Kelly said about a month from the end of the conference.
Sorry.


Barb E
"Listen to your life. See it for the fathomless mystery that it
is. In the boredom and pain of it no less than in the
excitement and gladness: touch, taste, smell your way to
the holy and hidden heart of it because in the last
analysis all moments are key moments, and life itself is
grace."

- Frederick Buechner, Author, in "Now and Then"




on 8/15/03 1:19 AM, CelticFrau@... at CelticFrau@... wrote:

> OK, I know I'm really jumping the gun on this....but as a poor unfortunate
> that is not able to attend the conference, could I get an inkling as to when
> tapes from the conference will be available? And also, a ballpark figure of
> what
> the cost of a full set (all the tapes made available) would be?
>
> (chomping at the bit...)
> Nancy B. in WV

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] conference tape orders
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/15/2003 12:20:28 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Also, I know this was mentioned before but if any of the speakers were comfortable with
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/15/2003 12:20:28 AM Central Daylight Time,
CelticFrau@... writes:

> OK, I know I'm really jumping the gun on this....but as a poor unfortunate
> that is not able to attend the conference, could I get an inkling as to when
>
> tapes from the conference will be available?

Also, I know this was mentioned before but if any of the speakers were
comfortable with being videotaped, I'd be definitely willing to pay some bucks for
videos of presentations. I'd like to feel like I was there! (Really wish I
could be actually THERE but funds for travel, hotel, etc...aren't here.)
Amy Kagey
Email me for a list
of used homeschooling books!
<A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=1684902">my Usborne Books website!</A>

messages.subject: [Unschooling-Discussion] conference tape orders
messages.msgSnippet: OK, I know I m really jumping the gun on this....but as a poor unfortunate that is not able to attend the conference, could I get an inkling as to when tapes
messages.messageBody:
OK, I know I'm really jumping the gun on this....but as a poor unfortunate
that is not able to attend the conference, could I get an inkling as to when
tapes from the conference will be available? And also, a ballpark figure of what
the cost of a full set (all the tapes made available) would be?

(chomping at the bit...)
Nancy B. in WV


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
